Name: STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics)
Description: Majors related to scientific, technological, engineering, and mathematical fields.

Name: Business & Economics
Description: Majors focused on the study of business, finance, economics, and management.

Name: Health & Medicine
Description: Majors related to the study of health, medicine, and wellness fields.

Name: Social Sciences & Humanities
Description: Majors in disciplines that study human society, behavior, and culture.

Name: Arts & Media
Description: Majors focused on creative and performing arts, as well as media, journalism, and digital communication.

Name: Engineering
Description: Majors related to the study of various types of engineering.

Name: Computer Science
Description: Majors related to computer systems, software, and algorithms.

Name: Business Administration
Description: Study of managing and overseeing business operations.

Name: Economics
Description: Focuses on the production, consumption, and distribution of goods and services.

Name: Nursing
Description: Focuses on providing healthcare to individuals and communities.

Name: Medical Sciences
Description: Deals with the scientific study of medicine and healthcare.

Name: Psychology
Description: Study of the mind and behavior.

Name: Sociology
Description: Study of society, social behavior, and institutions.

Name: Fine Arts
Description: Study of visual and performing arts including painting, sculpture, and design.

Name: Media Studies
Description: Focuses on communication, journalism, and digital media.
